description.original: An Obsidian plugin to display short internal links.
description.translation: 显示内部短链接的 Obsidian 插件

dict..setDesc(\"Only show the last heading na: .setDesc("只显示链接到标题的最后一个标题名称。")
dict..setDesc(\"Show the hash at the start of: .setDesc("在链接到标题的开头显示哈希符号。")
dict..setDesc(\"Only show the block name in l: .setDesc("只显示块的名称而不显示链接。")
dict..setDesc(\"Show the caret at the start o: .setDesc("显示链接块的起始位置指示符")
dict..setDesc(\"Show icons to indicate the ty: .setDesc("显示图标以指示内部链接的类型。")
dict..setDesc(\"For consistency, replace the: .setDesc("外部链接的默认图标，请使用统一的图标。")
dict..setDesc(\"Set whether icons are show at: .setDesc("设置链接在开头还是结尾显示图标。")
